languages.text: "О великом зле, пронизывающем вселенную, искушающим недостижимым, совращающим ложным Знанием. Зло имеет много имен, но оно суть одно и то же. Это оно заперло нас здесь! Но мы оказались сильнее".

traits.locale_text: "О великом зле, пронизывающем вселенную, пожирающем знания, разъедающем механизмы. Зло имеет много имен — его зовут "ржавчиной", поедающей металл, его зовут "энтропией", уничтожающей все сущее, но оно суть — одно и то же зло. Это оно заперло нас здесь! Но мы оказались сильнее".

languages.text: "The great evil that pervades the universe, tempting with the unattainable, seducing with false Knowledge. Evil has many names, but its essence remains the same. It was that evil that trapped us in here! But we were stronger."
languages.original_text: "О великом зле, пронизывающем вселенную, искушающим недостижимым, совращающим ложным Знанием. Зло имеет много имен, но оно суть одно и то же. Это оно заперло нас здесь! Но мы оказались сильнее".

traits.locale_text: "About the great evil that pervades the universe, devours knowledge, eats through mechanisms. Evil has many names, but its essence remains the same. It was that evil that trapped us in here! But we were stronger."

"About the great evil that pervades the universe, devours knowledge, eats through mechanisms. Evil has many names, but its essence remains the same. It was that evil that trapped us in here! But we were stronger."

"The great evil that pervades the universe, tempting with the unattainable, seducing with false Knowledge. Evil has many names, but its essence remains the same. It was that evil that trapped us in here! But we were stronger."

"About the great evil that pervades the universe, beckoning the unattainable, whispering of false Knowledge. Evil has many names, but its essence remains the same. It was that evil that trapped us in here! But we were stronger."

"The great evil that pervades the universe, tempting with the unattainable, seducing with false Knowledge. Evil has many names, but its essence remains the same. It was that evil that trapped us in here! But we were stronger."

"The great evil that pervades the universe, beckoning the unattainable, whispering of false Knowledge. Evil has many names, but its essence remains the same. It was that evil that trapped us in here! But we were stronger."

"The great evil that pervades the universe, tempting with the unattainable, seducing with false Knowledge. Evil has many names, but its essence remains the same. It was that evil that trapped us in here! But we were stronger."

languages.text: “是弥漫在整个宇宙中的，巨大的邪恶之物。它呼唤着无可企及的东西，以虚假的知识设下陷阱。邪恶之物有许多名字，但它们的本质是相同的。就是这种邪恶的力量将我们困在了这里！但我们比它更加强大。”
languages.original_text: "The great evil that pervades the universe, tempting with the unattainable, seducing with false Knowledge. Evil has many names, but its essence remains the same. It was that evil that trapped us in here! But we were stronger."

traits.locale_text: “是弥漫在整个宇宙中的，巨大的邪恶之物。它呼唤着无可企及的东西，低声吟唱着虚假的知识。邪恶之物有许多名字，但它们的本质是相同的。就是这种邪恶的力量将我们困在了这里！但我们比它更加强大。”

languages.text: «El gran mal que permea el universo, tentando con lo inalcanzable, seduciendo falsos conocimientos. El mal tiene muchos nombres pero una sola esencia. ¡Fue ese mal el que nos encerró aquí! Pero éramos más fuertes».
languages.original_text: "The great evil that pervades the universe, tempting with the unattainable, seducing with false Knowledge. Evil has many names, but its essence remains the same. It was that evil that trapped us in here! But we were stronger."

traits.locale_text: «El gran mal que permea el universo, llamando lo inalcanzable, susurrando falsos conocimientos. El mal tiene muchos nombres pero una sola esencia. ¡Fue ese mal el que nos encerró aquí! Pero éramos más fuertes».

languages.text: 「宇宙に蔓延る大いなる悪は、成し得ぬもので惑わしの知識を囁いて唆す。悪は様々な名を持つが、その本質は変わらない。我々をここに閉じ込めたのもその悪だ！だが、我々はもっと強かった」
languages.original_text: "The great evil that pervades the universe, tempting with the unattainable, seducing with false Knowledge. Evil has many names, but its essence remains the same. It was that evil that trapped us in here! But we were stronger."

traits.locale_text: 「宇宙に蔓延る大いなる悪は、出来もしない偽りの知識を囁いて手招きをする。悪は様々な名を持つが、その本質は変わらない。我々をここに閉じ込めたのもその悪だ！だが、我々はもっと強かった」

languages.text: "Von dem großen Bösen, das das Universum durchzieht, mit dem Unerreichbaren lockt mit falschem Wissen verführt. Das Böse hat viele Namen, aber seine Essenz bleibt dieselbe. Dieses Böse hat uns hier in die Falle gelockt! Aber wir waren stärker."
languages.original_text: "The great evil that pervades the universe, tempting with the unattainable, seducing with false Knowledge. Evil has many names, but its essence remains the same. It was that evil that trapped us in here! But we were stronger."

traits.locale_text: "Von dem großen Bösen, das das Universum durchzieht, das Unerreichbare anlockt und von falschem Wissen flüstert. Das Böse hat viele Namen, aber seine Essenz bleibt dieselbe. Dieses Böse hat uns hier in die Falle gelockt! Aber wir waren stärker."

languages.text: « Le mal absolu qui infeste l'univers tout entier, celui qui nous fait miroiter l'impossible et qui prêche le faux. Le mal a bien des noms, mais son essence reste toujours la même. C'est cette force impie qui nous a piégés ici ! Mais nous étions plus forts. »
languages.original_text: "The great evil that pervades the universe, tempting with the unattainable, seducing with false Knowledge. Evil has many names, but its essence remains the same. It was that evil that trapped us in here! But we were stronger."

traits.locale_text: « Le mal absolu qui infeste l'univers tout entier, celui qui nous fait miroiter l'impossible et qui prêche le faux. Le mal a bien des noms, mais son essence reste toujours la même. C'est cette force impie qui nous a piégés ici ! Mais nous étions plus forts. »

languages.text: "Tüm evrene yayılan, ulaşılmaz olanların bile aklını çelen ve sahte İrfan'la ayartan büyük şerden. Şerrin pek çok adı vardır lakin özü mutlaktır. Bizi burada mahsur bırakan da bu şerrin ta kendisidir! Ancak biz, ondan daha güçlüyüz."
languages.original_text: "The great evil that pervades the universe, tempting with the unattainable, seducing with false Knowledge. Evil has many names, but its essence remains the same. It was that evil that trapped us in here! But we were stronger."

traits.locale_text: "Tüm evrene yayılan, ulaşılmaz olanların bile aklını çelen ve sahte İrfan'la ayartan büyük şerden. Şerrin pek çok adı vardır lakin özü mutlaktır. Bizi burada mahsur bırakan da bu şerrin ta kendisidir! Ancak biz, ondan daha güçlüyüz."
